pm_kisan.title: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
pm_kisan.description: Direct income support of ‚Çπ6,000 per year to all landholding farmer families

pmfby.title: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
pmfby.description: Crop insurance scheme to provide financial support to farmers in case of crop failure

soil_health.title: Soil Health Card Scheme
soil_health.description: Issue soil health cards to farmers every 2 years with crop-wise recommendations

seed_purchase.title: Seed Purchase Subsidy
seed_purchase.description: Get up to 50% subsidy on certified seeds for eligible farmers.

drip_irrigation.title: Drip Irrigation Subsidy
drip_irrigation.description: Financial support for micro-irrigation systems to save water.

chatbot.name: KisanSahay
chatbot.welcome_message: Hello! How can I help with your farm today?
chatbot.default_response: I understand you have a question about farming. You can ask me about weather, irrigation, fertilizers, pest control, harvesting, soil health, crop rotation, government schemes, market prices, or disease detection. How can I help you today?

sustainability.title: Sustainable Practice Tip
sustainability.setup_message: Complete your roadmap setup to get personalized sustainability tips!

tips.irrigation: üíß Use drip irrigation to save 30% water. Consider rainwater harvesting for sustainable water management.
tips.pest: üêõ Implement integrated pest management with beneficial insects. Use neem oil as natural pesticide.
tips.fertilizer: üå± Use compost and organic fertilizers. Create your own compost from kitchen waste and farm residues.
tips.default: üåç Practice crop rotation and intercropping for soil health. Use cover crops to prevent soil erosion.

questions.weather: What's the weather forecast for my crops?
questions.irrigation: How often should I water my crops?
questions.fertilizer: What fertilizer should I use for my crops?
questions.pest_control: How can I control pests naturally?
questions.harvest: When is the best time to harvest?
questions.soil_health: How can I improve my soil health?
questions.crop_rotation: What is crop rotation and why is it important?
questions.government_schemes: What government schemes are available for farmers?
questions.market_prices: How can I check current market prices?
questions.disease_detection: How can I detect plant diseases early?

answers.weather: üå§Ô∏è Check the weather forecast in the app's weather section. For crops, monitor temperature, rainfall, and humidity. Rainy weather is good for irrigation, while sunny weather helps with growth and ripening.
answers.irrigation: üíß Water frequency depends on crop type, soil, and weather. Generally, water when top 2-3 inches of soil is dry. Use drip irrigation for efficiency and water conservation.
answers.fertilizer: üå± Use organic fertilizers like compost and manure. For chemical fertilizers, follow soil test recommendations. Apply fertilizers during active growth periods for best results.
answers.pest_control: üêõ Use natural methods: neem oil, beneficial insects, crop rotation, and proper spacing. Avoid chemical pesticides when possible. Monitor crops regularly for early pest detection.
answers.harvest: üåæ Harvest timing varies by crop. Look for maturity signs: color change, size, and texture. Harvest in early morning for better quality. Check market prices before harvesting.
answers.soil_health: üåç Improve soil with organic matter, crop rotation, cover crops, and proper pH balance. Test soil regularly and add nutrients as needed. Avoid over-tilling.
answers.crop_rotation: üîÑ Crop rotation prevents soil depletion and pest buildup. Rotate between different plant families. Plan 3-4 year rotation cycles for best results.
answers.government_schemes: üèõÔ∏è Check the Policy Dashboard for available schemes like PM-KISAN, crop insurance, irrigation subsidies, and seed distribution programs. Apply online through government portals.
answers.market_prices: üìà Use the Market Updates section to check current prices. Prices vary by location and season. Plan your harvest timing based on market trends and demand.
answers.disease_detection: üîç Use the Disease Detection feature to scan plant images. Look for spots, discoloration, wilting, or unusual growth. Early detection helps prevent spread.

organic.neem_pesticides: üå± Neem-based pesticides trending for pest control
organic.compost_tea: ü•¨ Compost tea gaining popularity for soil health
